full_sentence: No single country is capable of taking in 1 billion refugees. Imagine, if only we could! Europe must coordinate its efforts and distribute refugee quotas. There is nothing to be done for them unless we act together as a bloc.
At least coronavirus is taking down the overpopulation in China
All Spaniards are barbaric, just look at the bull run. They need to move into the 21st Centurary
I wish roma people would die, maybe we could go set some caravans on fire

My son is quiet, not into football, a bit geeky and very artistic. It wouldn't worry me if he said he was a girl. However, he isn't. He is a boy who doesn't like sports and would rather draw instead! Thank goodness puberty is a less traumatic process for under 16's now. I was never interested in dolls either or makeup. Im still not bothered about makeup and jewellery etc. Im not a man just because of that. Im a woman who can't be bothered to dress up and put on makeup!
